content: looking for a quick and delightful crochet project look no further than the trinity gift card holder this unisex gift card holder is the perfect solution for any occasion - birthdays anniversaries or just because not only is it a fun and easy project but it also allows you to give a handmade gift that will be cherished forever we ve all been in situations where we lack the time or inspiration to create something big and that s where this gift card holder comes in with just around 40 yards of yarn and a crochet hook you can whip up a unique and thoughtful gift in no time gift cards have become incredibly popular especially for those hard-to-buy-for individuals or when someone specifically requests one but why settle for a generic gift card presentation when you can add a touch of handmade love the trinity gift card holder allows you to personalize your gift even further with the addition of a button the best part this crochet pattern is designed to minimize sewing and stitching made in one piece and in the round the only sewing required is to attach the button and sew in your ends talk about convenience and efficiency don t worry if you re not an expert crocheter - this project is suitable for confident beginners and intermediate crocheters you ll be able to complete your trinity gift card holder in less than an hour making it a truly urgent and compelling choice for your next project speaking of the design the use of the trinity stitch ensures that there are no gaps in your finished piece however if you re feeling adventurous you can even transform this pattern into a cute little purse by adding a zipper instead of a button ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them ❤ size this pattern will turn to be approximately 4 wide and 3 5 tall if you meet gauge ❤ materials any 4 weight yarn of your choosing i recommend cotton for this project but that is not essential i used paintbox cotton aran 4mm hook 1 button of your choosing scissors tapestry needle stitch markers optional to mark first or last stitch of the round measuring tape sewing needle and thread for the button
